name: A cargo of poetry
description:
Nobody is working anymore since the cargo of poetry has calmly wrecked on the nearby cliffs. We spend our days on the beach, waiting for the waves to carry random words fragments...

A short poetic experience that regenerates every time.

Made for bitsy's jam "Shipwreck" and minijam 105 "Dreamy" with constraint "Every Playthrough is Unique"

Art and music by myself. Made with bipsi, a tool inspired of bitsy, using a custom rendering script based on color queenjazz's color hack.
